channel.title: Need advanced run.bat help
channel.description: i get this error [code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I understand it's saying i dont have enough memory, how is this problem resolved? much appreciated

item.title: Need advanced run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @dwarfs222 dwarfs222
item.description:
@dwarfs222 wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:2, topic:451995”]Okay Simply Open the run.bat up and you should see something likes this

Just change that 524 to “1024” and if its 1024 change it too “1600”[/quote]

Thanks, never knew this

EDIT:
I can’t find Xmx -524 or Xmx -1024
My run.bat looks like this:

@echo off title Project Insanity java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need advanced run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Okay Simply Open the run.bat up and you should see something likes this

Just change that 524 to “1024” and if its 1024 change it too “1600”

item.description:
@NieX wrote:

i get this error Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .
I understand it’s saying i dont have enough memory, how is this problem resolved? much appreciated
